output.formatted_report_T002:
📊 Mahindra XUV 3XO: Features and Safety Analysis

🎯 Executive Summary

The Mahindra XUV 3XO is a compact SUV that offers a blend of style, performance, and safety. This report provides a comprehensive analysis of its key features, with a special focus on its safety aspects, including active and passive safety systems, ADAS, crash test ratings, and certifications.

🔍 Overview

The Mahindra XUV 3XO is available in both Petrol and Diesel engines. The 1197 cc Petrol engine generates a power of 109.96bhp@5000rpm and a torque of 200Nm@1500-3500rpm. The 1498 cc Diesel engine generates a power of 115.05bhp@3750rpm and a torque of 300Nm@1500-2500rpm. Mahindra XUV 3XO is available in both Manual & Automatic transmission. The claimed mileage of XUV 3XO is 21.2 kmpl. In configurations, Mahindra XUV 3XO has a dimensions of 3990 mm in length, 1821 mm in width and 1647 mm in height.

Key Specs:

  • Emission Norm Compliance: BS VI 2.0
  • Mileage: 18.2 Kmpl
  • Engine Displ.: 1197 cc
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Fuel Type: Petrol
  • Boot Space: 364 Liters
  • Power Windows: Front and Rear
  • Airbags: Driver, Passenger and Side Front
  • ABS: Yes
  • Central Locking: Yes
  • Global NCAP Safety Rating: 5 Star

💰 Price and Variants

The Mahindra XUV 3XO is available in multiple variants with varying features and prices:

  • XUV 3XO MX1: Rs. 7.99 - 15.80 Lakh
  • XUV 3XO MX2 Pro: Rs. 9.4 Lakh*
  • XUV 3XO MX3: Rs. 9.7 Lakh*
  • XUV 3XO MX2 Diesel: Rs. 10.0 Lakh*
  • XUV 3XO MX3 Pro: Rs. 10.0 Lakh*

⚙️ Engine and Transmission

The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options.

Engine Options:

  • 1.2L Turbo Petrol (110 PS)
  • 1.2L TGDi Turbo Petrol (130 PS)
  • 1.5L Diesel (117 PS)

Transmission Options:

  • Manual
  • AMT
  • 6-speed Torque Converter

🚘 Exterior Features

The Mahindra XUV 3XO features LED DRLs and headlamps and infinity tail lamps. It also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels.

Key Exterior Features:

  • LED DRL with Front turn Indicator
  • Diamond Cut Alloys
  • Rear Spoiler
  • Roof Rails

🛋️ Interior Features

The interior of the XUV 3XO includes features like a Skyroof, soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard, premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and passive keyless entry.

Key Interior Features:

  • 65 W USB - C Fast Charging
  • Adjustable Headrest for 2nd Row Middle Passenger
  • Soft Touch Leatherette on Dashboard & Door Trims
  • Digital Cluster
  • Air Conditioner

💺 Comfort and Convenience

The car includes features like Smart Steering Modes, Auto Wiper, Rear AC Ducts, and Wireless Phone Charging.

Comfort Features:

  • Smart Steering Modes
  • Auto Wiper
  • Rear AC Ducts
  • Heater
  • Power Steering
  • Steering Mounted Audio Control
  • Cruise Control
  • Power Windows (Front / Rear)
  • Adjustable Driver Seat
  • Wireless Phone Charging
  • Folding Rear Seat 60:40 Split
  • Height Adjustable Driver Seat
  • Rear AC Vents
  • Multifunction Steering Wheel
  • Engine Start Stop Button
  • Tachometer
  • Rear Seat Centre Arm Rest
  • Adjustable Headrest
  • Seat Belt Warning
  • Push Ignition
  • Touch-screen Display

🎶 Infotainment and Connectivity

The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system, a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation, and built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment. It also features ADRENOX Connect technology, which allows you to control your car's features through your smartphone.

🛡️ Safety Features

Safety is a key priority in the Mahindra XUV 3XO, offering a range of active and passive safety systems, along with ADAS features.

The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a Global NCAP Safety Rating of 5 stars.

Active Safety Features:

  • ABS (Anti-Lock Braking System)
  • EBD (Electronic Brakeforce Distribution)
  • Brake Assist

Passive Safety Features:

  • Airbags (Driver, Passenger, and Side Front)
  • Seat Belt Warning

ADAS (Advanced Driver Assistance Systems):

The Mahindra XUV 3XO has Level 2 ADAS.

Safety Certification:

The Mahindra XUV 3XO adheres to BS VI 2.0 emission norms, indicating a focus on environmental safety as well.

📏 Dimensions and Capacity

The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a length of 3990 mm, a width of 1821 mm, and a height of 1647 mm. It has a wheelbase of 2600 mm and a boot capacity of 364 liters.

➕ Additional Features

The Mahindra XUV 3XO includes additional features such as:

  • Smart Steering Modes
  • Auto Wiper

🏁 Conclusion

The Mahindra XUV 3XO stands out as a well-rounded compact SUV with a strong emphasis on safety, performance, and comfort. Its comprehensive suite of features and competitive pricing make it a compelling choice in its segment.

The 1197 cc Petrol engine generates a power of 109.96bhp@5000rpm and a torque of 200Nm@1500-3500rpm. Published on 27 Aug, 2024, 9:41 AM IST Updated on 28 Aug, 2024, 5:59 AM IST Team Ackodrive 8 min read Interesting Articles Follow us on Share Post Mahindra recently launched the much-awaited Mahindra XUV 3XO as a compact SUV in the Indian automotive industry. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. output.formatted_report_T002:
📊 Mahindra XUV 3XO: Features and Safety Analysis

🎯 Executive Summary

The Mahindra XUV 3XO is a compact SUV that offers a blend of style, performance, and safety. This report provides a comprehensive analysis of its key features, with a special focus on its safety aspects, including active and passive safety systems, ADAS, crash test ratings, and certifications.

🔍 Overview

The Mahindra XUV 3XO is available in both Petrol and Diesel engines. The 1197 cc Petrol engine generates a power of 109.96bhp@5000rpm and a torque of 200Nm@1500-3500rpm. The 1498 cc Diesel engine generates a power of 115.05bhp@3750rpm and a torque of 300Nm@1500-2500rpm. Mahindra XUV 3XO is available in both Manual & Automatic transmission. The claimed mileage of XUV 3XO is 21.2 kmpl. In configurations, Mahindra XUV 3XO has a dimensions of 3990 mm in length, 1821 mm in width and 1647 mm in height.

Key Specs:

  • Emission Norm Compliance: BS VI 2.0
  • Mileage: 18.2 Kmpl
  • Engine Displ.: 1197 cc
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Fuel Type: Petrol
  • Boot Space: 364 Liters
  • Power Windows: Front and Rear
  • Airbags: Driver, Passenger and Side Front
  • ABS: Yes
  • Central Locking: Yes
  • Global NCAP Safety Rating: 5 Star

💰 Price and Variants

The Mahindra XUV 3XO is available in multiple variants with varying features and prices:

  • XUV 3XO MX1: Rs. 7.99 - 15.80 Lakh
  • XUV 3XO MX2 Pro: Rs. 9.4 Lakh*
  • XUV 3XO MX3: Rs. 9.7 Lakh*
  • XUV 3XO MX2 Diesel: Rs. 10.0 Lakh*
  • XUV 3XO MX3 Pro: Rs. 10.0 Lakh*

⚙️ Engine and Transmission

The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options.

Engine Options:

  • 1.2L Turbo Petrol (110 PS)
  • 1.2L TGDi Turbo Petrol (130 PS)
  • 1.5L Diesel (117 PS)

Transmission Options:

  • Manual
  • AMT
  • 6-speed Torque Converter

🚘 Exterior Features

The Mahindra XUV 3XO features LED DRLs and headlamps and infinity tail lamps. It also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels.

Key Exterior Features:

  • LED DRL with Front turn Indicator
  • Diamond Cut Alloys
  • Rear Spoiler
  • Roof Rails

🛋️ Interior Features

The interior of the XUV 3XO includes features like a Skyroof, soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard, premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and passive keyless entry.

Key Interior Features:

  • 65 W USB - C Fast Charging
  • Adjustable Headrest for 2nd Row Middle Passenger
  • Soft Touch Leatherette on Dashboard & Door Trims
  • Digital Cluster
  • Air Conditioner

💺 Comfort and Convenience

The car includes features like Smart Steering Modes, Auto Wiper, Rear AC Ducts, and Wireless Phone Charging.

Comfort Features:

  • Smart Steering Modes
  • Auto Wiper
  • Rear AC Ducts
  • Heater
  • Power Steering
  • Steering Mounted Audio Control
  • Cruise Control
  • Power Windows (Front / Rear)
  • Adjustable Driver Seat
  • Wireless Phone Charging
  • Folding Rear Seat 60:40 Split
  • Height Adjustable Driver Seat
  • Rear AC Vents
  • Multifunction Steering Wheel
  • Engine Start Stop Button
  • Tachometer
  • Rear Seat Centre Arm Rest
  • Adjustable Headrest
  • Seat Belt Warning
  • Push Ignition
  • Touch-screen Display

🎶 Infotainment and Connectivity

The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system, a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation, and built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment. It also features ADRENOX Connect technology, which allows you to control your car's features through your smartphone.

🛡️ Safety Features

Safety is a key priority in the Mahindra XUV 3XO, offering a range of active and passive safety systems, along with ADAS features.

The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a Global NCAP Safety Rating of 5 stars.

Active Safety Features:

  • ABS (Anti-Lock Braking System)
  • EBD (Electronic Brakeforce Distribution)
  • Brake Assist

Passive Safety Features:

  • Airbags (Driver, Passenger, and Side Front)
  • Seat Belt Warning

ADAS (Advanced Driver Assistance Systems):

The Mahindra XUV 3XO has Level 2 ADAS.

Safety Certification:

The Mahindra XUV 3XO adheres to BS VI 2.0 emission norms, indicating a focus on environmental safety as well.

📏 Dimensions and Capacity

The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a length of 3990 mm, a width of 1821 mm, and a height of 1647 mm. It has a wheelbase of 2600 mm and a boot capacity of 364 liters.

➕ Additional Features

The Mahindra XUV 3XO includes additional features such as:

  • Smart Steering Modes
  • Auto Wiper

🏁 Conclusion

The Mahindra XUV 3XO stands out as a well-rounded compact SUV with a strong emphasis on safety, performance, and comfort. Its comprehensive suite of features and competitive pricing make it a compelling choice in its segment.
